CustomField.description: Business days remaining for SLA attainment
CustomField.formula: 5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + Project_Deliverable__r.SLA__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate + Project_Deliverable__r.SLA__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Business days remaining for SLA attainment
CustomField.label: Days to Complete
